name: OpenContext (0xranx)
description: [项目级] A personal context store for AI agents and assistants—reuse your existing coding agent CLI (Codex/Claude/OpenCode) with built‑in Skills/tools and a desktop GUI to capture, search, and reuse project knowledge across agents and repos.。来源: https://github.com/0xranx/OpenContext

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A personal context store for AI agents and assistants—reuse your existing coding agent CLI (Codex/Claude/OpenCode) with built‑in Skills/tools and a desktop GUI to capture, search, and reuse project knowledge across agents and repos.

来源: https://github.com/0xranx/OpenContext
语言: JavaScript
Stars: 391
